attributes.action: help marnie pearce regain access to her children - by promoting dialogue with UAE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UAE recognises the rights of children, Marnie's 2 boys are british.  The british government should be seen to support and protect the interests of britishers abroad.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
